entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
